price: 89. solo (servirá) presentarse ante Al-lah con un corazón limpio (de incredulidad)”.
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلۡبٖ سَلِيمٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International

meta.transliteration: illā man atā al-laha biqalbin salīmin
